msg: Fixed Windows build break due to util prefix change

author: kevan
msg: GERONIMO-3053 Fix memory-related errors that can occur during multiple deploy/undeploy cycles. Not actually a memory leak, per se. We were creating way more JarFiles than we should have been. The number of JarFiles being created could have been reduced by a more effective (correct) cloning algorithm. However, rather than cloning our ClassLoader DAG, we now use a TemporaryClassLoader which reuses the existing ClassLoader DAG. TemporaryClassLoader comes from OpenEJB which got it from OpenJPA...

author: akulshreshtha
msg: GERONIMO-2898 Drop MinThread attribute of jetty connector from ConnectorPortlet
